title: Development of Personalized Instructional Design Strategies Through MOOC Learning Outcome Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data analysis competency and experience with MOOC platform usage
context.additional_context: For professional learners conducting project-based assessments in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more key differences among three achievement groups (failure/satisfactory/excellent) by analyzing MOOC activity data.
Learners can create personalized learning plans using data-driven engagement metrics (task completion rates, cognitive engagement levels, etc.).
Learners can propose two or more strategies for session management, content sequencing, and cognitive engagement to improve learning achievement.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
